content: WASHINGTON  Jan 13 President Barack Obama sent a bill to Congress on Tuesday to strengthen U.S. cybersecurity laws to protect government  businesses and consumers while protecting privacy  after recent hacking attacks against Sony Pictures  Home Depot Inc and Target Corp   and on Monday the federal government itself.
